content: a short row heel omit all the gusset instructions and just continue working the chart in the round straight after the heel you could easily re-arrange the order of the 3 parts of the design especially if you need a much shorter leg you may have noticed that the sts on the first side of the heel flap are picked up in one colour only while the sts on the second side are picked up in the stripe sole pattern this eliminates the need to cut and re-join the second colour but if the difference bothers you feel free to cut the second colour at the start of the heel flap and re-join it when you are about to start picking up at the first side of the flap joining it in the centre back would result in a small jog glossary st sts stitch stitches k knit p purl sl slip k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches separately as if to knit insert left needle into these two stitches from the right and knit onto right needle p2tog purl 2 stitches together m1 make 1 st by lifting the strand between the sts and knitting into the back of it instep chart onopordum page 7 leg chart 2 colour onopordum page 8
